definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves

sentences.english: Let children know the way to put on pullover.
sentences.chinese: 讓幼兒瞭解穿套衫的方法，並鼓勵幼兒積極嘗試。

sentences.english: According to the symbol on the label, this sweater should be washed by hand.
sentences.chinese: 根據標籤上的符號，這件針織套衫應該用手洗。
這件羊毛套衫你穿很合身。

sentences.english: A pair of jeans, a pullover and sneakers are just about enough.
sentences.chinese: 一條牛仔褲，一件套衫和一雙帆布鞋足矣。

sentences.english: His clothes were dark and he wore a woolly jumper.
sentences.chinese: 他的外套是暗色的的，穿了一件羊毛套衫。

sentences.english: Pullover tunic flaunts a point collar and open half placket.
sentences.chinese: 套衫中山裝標榜點衣領和開半門襟。

sentences.english: I'm after a size 40 V-neck pullover in grey.
sentences.chinese: 我要一件40號灰色雞心領套衫。

sentences.english: I waited in the hallway, she went to get it.
sentences.chinese: 她讓我在走廊裏等着，自己走進去拿我的套衫。

sentences.english: You should have seen the keen sweater she made for me last Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 你應該看看上次聖誕節她爲我織的漂亮套衫。

sentences.english: Emily had to cast on extra stitches to make the pullover wide enough.
sentences.chinese: 埃米莉爲了把套衫織得寬些，只好多放幾針。

sentences.english: Pullover sweater sports a 12-gauge merino wool knit.
sentences.chinese: 套衫毛衣體育12號美利奴羊毛針織。

sentences.english: She wore a high-necked pullover to keep out the wind.
sentences.chinese: 她穿一件高領套衫以御風寒。

sentences.english: I put on a pullover this morning because I thought it was going to be cold.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我穿上一件套衫，因爲我想天氣也許要冷的。

sentences.english: An easy sweatshirt -knit pullover with wide straps, to wear layered or alone.
sentences.chinese: 一款簡單的套衫配上寬大的肩帶，休閒舒適。

sentences.english: Pullover hoodie with contrast taping at drawstring.
sentences.chinese: 套衫連帽抽繩綁帶對比。

sentences.english: He is wearing a turtleneck sweater and a jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一件高翻領套衫和一件外套。

definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves
